subject: kjava, kvm testing
msgSnippet: Hi, I know JUNIT is great for java testing. How about kjava running on kvm? Does anyone have experience on using that on JUNIT for API test? If so, can I have
messageBody:
Hi,

I know JUNIT is great for java testing. How about
kjava running on kvm? Does anyone have experience on
using that on JUNIT for API test? If so, can I have
some tips on that?

thanks
-joe
